about.description: At HomyClean, we go beyond surface cleaning — we bring life back to your space. Our dedicated team combines expert care, eco-friendly solutions, and attention to detail to ensure every home feels fresh.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.missionText: We strive to provide the highest quality cleaning services using eco-friendly products and modern equipment. Our goal is to make every home clean, healthy, and cozy.
contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.description: Have questions? We're here to help. Contact us in any convenient way.
modal.title: Get a Free Quote
equipment.ecoDesc: We use only environmentally friendly and hypoallergenic cleaning products that contain no harmful chemicals. Safe for people, pets, and the environment while maintaining high effectiveness.
equipment.proDesc: We use modern steam vacuum cleaners, rotary carpet machines, professional HEPA vacuums, and specialized upholstery cleaning equipment.
team.reason1Desc: All employees are trained and work according to strict quality standards.
team.reason2Desc: Professional equipment and safe chemicals from leading brands.
team.reason3Desc: We care about the health of our clients and minimize our impact on the environment.
team.reason4Desc: Favorable rates for those who want cleaning surfaces and more to become an unnoticeable routine.
team.reason5Desc: Select the required service and time in a couple of clicks directly from the website.
footer.brandDesc: Crafting meaningful designs that blend creativity, usability, and impact.
footer.address2: Store #10, Jebel Ali Industrial Area - Dubai - UAE
servicePage.notFoundDesc: The service you're looking for doesn't exist.
carpet.sizesSubtitle: Transparent pricing for your carpet cleaning needs
carpet.ourTeam: Our team will come and measure the carpet for you
sofa.intro: Regular cleaning of sofas and mattresses is not just a matter of aesthetics, but the key to the health and comfort of the whole family. Our team of professionals offers comprehensive services for cleaning sofas and mattresses using eco-friendly, hypoallergenic products. We remove not only visible stains, but also deeply ingrained dirt, bacteria and odors, returning your furniture to freshness and presentable appearance.
sofa.beforeDesc: Before you entrust your sofa or mattress to our team of professionals for cleaning, it looks something like this.
sofa.afterDesc: After thorough work, your sofa will look like this. Is this magic? No, it's our team of professionals.
curtains.intro: Regular cleaning of curtains and blinds helps keep them fresh always, extend their service life and improve indoor air quality. At iCleaning we offer professional cleaning of all types of curtains and blinds — on-site or at our facility.
regular.heroTitle: Cleaning is not just about order, but about comfort, health and atmosphere
regular.heroDesc: At iCleaning, we offer two main formats: regular and deep cleaning. Both options are performed by a professional team using eco-friendly products and modern equipment.
regular.sizesSubtitle: Transparent pricing based on your space size
aircon.heroTitle: Regular Air Conditioner Cleaning — Your Key to Fresh, Clean, and Safe Air
aircon.heroDesc1: In the hot climate of the UAE, air conditioners work practically around the clock, accumulating dust, dirt, mold, and allergens inside. All of this poses an invisible threat to your health and air quality.
aircon.heroDesc2: The iCleaning team provides comprehensive air conditioner cleaning services for all types: from split systems and window units to cassette and industrial systems. We work with residential properties, offices, hotels, and commercial spaces. Using professional disinfecting agents, modern washing technologies, and powerful tools to restore the effectiveness and hygiene of your system.
